## RSSfileManager.getAdapter() method

Factory method to create proxies for RSS files

**Signature:**

```typescript
getAdapter(file: TFile): RSSfeedAdapter | RSSitemAdapter | RSScollectionAdapter | undefined;
```

</th><th>
